product_name: The North Face Metropolis Parka - Women's
long_description: Defy cabin fever. Stay warm and cozy in The North Face Metropolis down parka as you get out and about on even the chilliest winter days. Quilted, knee-length parka is insulated wtih 600-fill-power down. Down insulation delivers an unsurpassed warmth-to-weight ratio; it's one of the lightest, warmest and most compressible insulations available. Nylon taffeta exterior features a Durable Water Repellent finish to ward off snow and drizzle. Adjustable hood removes when you don't need it. Two-way center front zipper lets you unzip part-way up from the bottom in order to sit down or stride more easily. Front zipper has snap placket for wind resistance and brushed chin guard for comfort. The North Face Metropolis down jacket features two hidden-zip hand pockets and an internal media pocket with cord guide.
short_description: Defy cabin fever. Stay warm and cozy in The North Face Metropolis down parka as you get out and about on even the chilliest winter days.
